page.title: 04CROWAN COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The school was built in 1896. The school has a playground either side of it. It has two flower gardens and two vegetable gardens. It has a field for playing in and for football and cricket. It has two climbing frames, a big one and a little one. The playground has just been resurfaced and most of the trees had to be cut down because of{Dutch Elm disease.}There is a caravan with office and library where the headteacher and secretary both work. In the school building there are three classrooms, two cloakrooms, one hall and one canteen. There are three full time teachers and one part-time. There are{seventy children}who come to school. Most of the children come from Praze. Some come from Crowan others from Black Rock and Tremayne.
